description: Determine the share of respondents who voted for Jackson 5.
Identify the boy band with the highest share of respondents.
Compute the total share of respondents for The Monkees and Boys II Men.
Find any boy band that has a share of respondents significantly lower than the others.
Identify if there is any correlation between the popularity of the boy bands and their share of respondents.
Which boy bands have a share of respondents greater than 0.1?
Rank the boy bands from the highest to the lowest share of respondents.
Determine the range of the share of respondents across all boy bands.
What percentage of the boy bands have a share of respondents less than 0.1?
Identify any clusters of boy bands with similar shares of respondents.
